name: creamery
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a business that produces or sells butter, cheese, or other products made from milk: The creamery produces Wensleydale cheese. There are so many small bakeries, creameries, and restaurants I have yet to try.
More examplesFewer examplesThe creamery at West Mansfield handles cream from the surrounding farms, frequently producing as much as seven hundred pounds of butter daily.The creamery mixes its own ice cream from 100 per cent local milk.In the small, modern creamery, I saw the delicious semi- soft cheese Criffel being made.This is a small artisanal creamery whose products vary from fresh cheeses to blue and hard aged cheeses and yoghurt.He started to brew his own beer in a converted old creamery building.
